subject: Basketball (College)
College Athletics
Basketball
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Duke is investigating whether an N.C.A.A. recruiting rule was violated when Coach Mike Krzyzewski reportedly offered a scholarship to a recruit during a summer tournament.
snippet: Duke is investigating whether an N.C.A.A. recruiting rule was violated when Coach Mike Krzyzewski reportedly offered a scholarship to a recruit during a summer tournament.
